title: Bug 4360Template  cursor at wrong position
SR: enter template as described in http://dev.eclipse.org/bugs/showbug.cgi?id=4358 enter the following codepublic void bar() {List list= null;for(list, Object, element)} replace for(...) with corresponding template you get the following codepublic void bar() {List list= null;for (Iterator iter= list.iterator; iter.hasNext();) {Object element= (Object) iter.next();{cursor}}} observe: cursor blinks at {cursor} not in the line above
